Comm100 Pricing Overview: Affordable Plans for Every Business Need
Our pricing is designed to maximize value with flexible packages and transparent per-agent/month billing. Choose individual products or bundled solutions for optimal savings.

**Live Chat Pricing (3 Tiers)**
Startup: $30 per agent/month
Plus: $50 per agent/month
Ultra: $100 per agent/month
 
**Ticketing Pricing (2 Tiers)**
Plus: $60/month
Ultra: $120/month
 
**Chatbot Pricing (3 Tiers)**
Generative Answers: $40/month
Plus: $80/month
Ultra: $110/month
 
You can find more information on these packages on the pricing page: https://www.comm100.com/pricing
For more details or a custom quote, please contact our sales team for assistance.
